title: Fleetwood Mac’s greatest rumour: charting Glastonbury’s obsession with the band
text:
The Glastonbury 50th anniversary dream is dead: Fleetwood Mac will not be playing the greatest music festival in the world. The Rumours – album or otherwise – will not come true.

Earlier this week, organiser Emily Eavis announced that no, Fleetwood Mac will be absent from Worthy Farm next summer. She remains “hopeful” that they will “one day”; but we all know there’s a bigger chance of Lindsey Buckingham and Stevie Nicks rekindling their destructive love affair than taking to the Pyramid Stage.

Year in, year out, Glastonbury attracts certain flights of fancy. There is the annual hunt for the underground Piano Bar and endless optimism that the sun will, eventually, appear through the clouds....
description: The Glastonbury 50th anniversary dream is dead:
